Tinten corrigeert de kleur van bakstenen, steen en beton

Door het mengen van speciaal geselecteerde pigmenten en het zorgvuldig aanbrengen kunnen we lelijke reparaties verbergen, een aanbouw aan laten sluiten op het bestaande gebouw of een gebouw een geheel nieuw aanzicht geven. Dit proces zorgt voor een hele natuurlijke en permanente kleurverandering

Voorbeelden

Just wanted to say that we are absolutely delighted with your work. It has totally transformed the front of our house and even on close examination you simply cannot tell the new bricks from the old. Wow! Wish we had known about your services years ago.

A. Cuffe SUTTON SM2

Peter has an artist‘s eye for detail and a perfectionist‘s dedication to quality. He works with enormous care and consideration and it shows in the end result. This level of service and skill is very hard to find these days and deserves recognition.

H & J Montgomery TUNBRIDGE WELLS TN7
Natural & Permanent
The tinting process we adopt is well established and has a long history of use. Treated masonry appears and behaves similarly to it’s untreated neighbours.
25 years Guarantee
Unless otherwise stated, our tinting services come with a 25 year guarantee to cover against any un-natural loss of colour during this time (subject to normal weathering conditions).
Knowledge & Experience
Bricks are usually treated individually so as to introduce the correct variety of colours, tones and patterns. The mortar colour can also be adjusted to ensure the best possible match is achieved.
Artistic Approach
With many years of experience in both tinting and building conservation / restoration in general, we are well placed to offer you an honest appraisal of the possible options.
